title: MetaClaude Projects Configuration
description: Central configuration for all projects consuming agentic artifacts

defaults.description: Default values inherited by all projects

base_dir.description: Default parent directory for projects (relative to metaclaude repo)

bundle.description: Default bundle if not specified per-project

projects.description: Map of project name to configuration

path.description: Override path (absolute or relative to metaclaude repo). If omitted, uses {base_dir}/{project-name}

bundle.description: Bundle name from registry (inherits from defaults if omitted)

excluded.description: Artifacts to exclude from the bundle

protected.description: Paths that should never be overwritten during sync

project_section.description: Path to project-specific CLAUDE.md content (relative to metaclaude repo)
